#Text=Hamas ends truce with Israel
#Text=Tuesday , December 23 , 2008
#Text=Shelter in
#Text=Sderot , Israel
#Text=Hamas declared a formal end to the six-month Israel - Hamas Egyptian-brokered truce at 4 a.m. GMT which was set to expire today .
#Text=The pact had begun to fail weeks ago with tit-for-tat attacks across Israel 's border with the Gaza Strip .
#Text=The past six months have seen a dramatic drop in the number of rockets and mortars fired into Israel from Gaza .

#Text=Yesterday saw an escalation of the violence , beginning with an Israeli air raid on Gaza and Hamas responded to Israel 's attack by firing eight rockets and five mortars at Israel 's southern towns .
#Text=However the past three days have seen up to 50 rockets fired , and Israeli operations in Gaza .
#Text=The European Union called for an " immediate cessation " of both Palestinian rocket fire and Israeli incursions .
#Text="

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The calm is over  , said Hamas official Ayman Taha , after talks with other Palestinian factions .

_	_	_	_

#Text=The calm , which was reached with Egyptian sponsorship on June 19 and expires on December 19 , is finished because the enemy did not abide by its obligations ,  said Fawzi Barhum , a spokesman for the Hamas .

_	_	_	_

#Text=The truce will end tomorrow .

#Text= During the rally a Hamas activist dressed as Gilad Shalit and begged for his life , asking to come home .

column1: #Text=The Israeli UN envoy , Professor Gabriela Shalev , decried the Hamas play mocking Gilad Shalit and voiced Israel 's outrage .

#Text=On Tuesday , 16 December , an Israeli court sentenced Aziz Dweik , the democratically elected head of the Palestinian Legislative Council , the Palestinian parliament , to three years in prison for belonging to Hamas .
#Text=He was arrested with other politicians after the capture of Gilad Shalit .
#Text=On Sunday , 14 December , Former U.S. President Jimmy Carter met with Khaled Meshaal , the leader of Hamas ' political wing .
#Text=The five-hour meeting was to discuss negotiations for the release of Gilad Shalit , a corporal in the Israeli Defense Forces .
#Text=Khaled said Hamas would allow Shalit to send a message to his parents but would not release him .
#Text=The Interim Arab Parliament ( IAP ) has called on the international community to work for the release of Palestinian Legislative Council ( PLC ) Speaker Aziz Dweik .

#Text=Palestinian leader Mahmoud Abbas , who is to hold talks with President George W. Bush on Friday , will press Washington to ensure " there is no return to square one once there is a new government in Israel , " said Palestinian negotiator Saeb Erakat .
#Text=The AP reports that President Bush and Abbas are assessing the stalled U.S.-backed negotiations with Israel that will almost certainly fail to meet a year-end deadline for a peace deal .
#Text=The U.S. Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice has said she believes the Annapolis process is the best way to a peace deal between Israel and the Palestinians .
#Text=U.N. Security Council endorsed the process as irreversible and urged the two parties to continue talking under its guidelines .
